Üdv a fedélzeten tengerész! Csatlakozz hozzánk egy tengeri utazásra annak érdekében, hogy kiadhassuk az óceánjárók jellegrajzairól valaha megjelent legrészletesebb, mégis látványos könyvünket. Segítségetekkel, a háromnyelvű könyvben megjelenik 30 cég 150 híres hajójának exkluzív profilja, amely egyben bepillantást enged a 19. és 20. század történetének egy izgalmas fejezetébe. LINERS. A történelem ott lesz a polcodon.
A hajóknak a műszaki rajzoktól a festményeken át az élethű valódi és virtuális modellekig számos ábrázolásmódja létezik. Ezek speciális formája a jellegrajz. A hajóprofilok különböző részletességgel és céllal készültek: A világháborúkban a tengeren harcolók zsebében lapuló sziluett-könyvek ábrái segítették az ellenség azonosítását, erejének és sebességének időben történő felismerését.
A hajóprofilok a hajózási könyveknek is kedvelt témái. Az utóbbi évtizedekben megjelent ilyen témájú gyűjteményes kötetekben mégis csak jellemzően kisméretű, ezért elnagyolt ábrázolásokat közöltek, amelyek sajnálatosan kevéssé részlet-gazdagok, a megismerésnek csak vázlatos lehetőségét biztosítják. A legnagyobb – kiemelhető és önálló képként akár be is keretezhető – nagy, színes táblákat tartalmazó hajóportré-kötet utoljára 1965-ben jelent meg, ám az is csak 12 hajóportréval.
Azóta a digitális ábrázolási technikák ugrásszerű fejlődése és az egykori hajókra vonatkozó adatok – eredeti hajógyári tervek, építői modellek és archív fotódokumentumok digitális feldolgozása és elérhetővé tétele révén az ábrázolás lehetőségei minden korábbinál pontosabbá és látványosabbá váltak.
Balogh Tamás az óceánjáró személyhajók szerelmese. Tervei szerint összesen mintegy 150 hajóprofil készül, a XIX. és a XX. század leghíresebb óceánjáró személyszállító hajóinak nagyméretű, színes jellegrajzaival. Ezek egy reprezentatív kötetbe gyűjtve jelennek meg, amely rendhagyó emléket állít az óceáni személyhajózás nagy korszakának.
Az óceánjárók az emberiség legnagyobb technikai-, munkaerő- és anyagi ráfordítással készültműszaki alkotásai közé tartoznak, amelyek a repülőgépek megjelenéséig az egyetlen átkelési lehetőséget biztosították a kontinensek között. Kezdetben ez a közlekedési mód is – mint minden más az életben – elsősorban inkább veszélyes volt, mint kényelmes. Az emberiség technikai-műszaki (és nem utolsó sorban esztétikai) fejlődésével azonban az egyszerre több ezer embert befogadó hatalmas hajók fedélzetén az Európa és Amerika között eltöltött 5-6 nap a transzóceáni átkelést az utasok számára egyedülálló élménnyé avatta. 




A legkiválóbb hajók pedig gyakran nemzeti szimbólumokká magasztosultak, amelyeket a leggyorsabb átkelés rekordját biztosító erőteljes gépek, a legpompásabb berendezés, elegancia és kényelem jellemzett.A mai óriási kirándulóhajók fedélzetén átélhető élmény sokban hasonlít ehhez, a menetrend szerinti óceáni átkeléssel töltött egyetlen hét varázsa azonban az 1960-as években örökre elenyészett... Ma már csak a rá emlékeztető tárgyak – köztük az igényes kivitelű hajóprofilok – segítenek felidézni ezt a kort.
Balogh Tamás rajzai digitális technológiával készültek, olyan felbontásban, amely gyakorlatilag majdnem tetszőleges méretű nagyítást tesz lehetővé. 
Az alkotó több száz korabeli fotóra és tervre, valamint a fennmaradt eredeti hajógyári modellekre is kiterjedő előzetes kutatómunkájának köszönhetően az általa készített hajóprofilok a legkisebb részletekig valósághűek, azokon szinte minden külső szerkezeti elem látható. Az alkalmazott színezési és árnyékolási technikák pedig a kétdimenziós megjelenítés során a lehetőségek határáig fokozzák az ábrázolás plasztikusságát. Munkája eredményeként így a szemnek is kellemes, az óceánjárókért rajongók számára pedig ritka élményt nyújtó alkotások jönnek létre, amelyeket Balogh Tamás most – a hajók történetéről szóló rövid leírással kiegészítve – egy kötetbe gyűjtve kíván átnyújtani az Olvasóknak.
Ehhez várjuk segítségüket, amellyel meghaladjuk az összes korábbi hasonló ábrázolás minőségét és mennyiségét egyaránt. Legyen részese Ön is ennek a csodálatos utazásnak!
Ami készül, az nem csak egy könyv. Egyrészt mar maguk a lapok is kiemelhető, keretezhető képek. Másrészt a design rendelhető (a megrendelők digitálisan kapják a hajókat ábrázolásait, amelyeket aztán tetszés szerint a legkülönfélébb formában használhatnak) – a megadott mintákból történő választást követően a kérésüknek megfelelően – iratgyűjtőre, csomagoló papírra, lakásdekorációs anyagokra (szőnyegre, tapétára, stb.) feldolgozva.

story:
Life is a wonderful adventure or nothing

Capt. Nicholas memoirs are a ode to the simple things in life. Onboard and onshore he tells his story of achievements and failures, heroic times and moments of personal humiliation with wit and honesty.

A man's face is his autobiography

His story is an intensely personal account of one man’s struggle with himself against the backdrop of the challenging times in which he lived.

A commander, a mentor, an inventor, he fought in the Battle of the Atlantic while his home in Liverpool came under bombardment. He narrowly escaped death a number of times.

His personal life was just as difficult as he fought to keep his family together. He was a hard man. Hard with everyone including himself, realising too late that commanding a ship and having a family are two entirely different things.

Maritime history in the making

These memoirs record at first hand the untold story of the passage from steam to diesel and the rise of Greek shipping. They give an anecdotal account of day to day life on ships and how that changed as the 20th century unfolded, in an era where the merchant navy was more than just a job.

The story behind the book

My uncle the late Captain Nicholas H. Raissis handed me his typed memoirs a few months before he passed away in June 2011 at the age of 99. I felt compelled to publish this book and thus pay tribute to the mariners of the twentieth century.

As a journalist, I have already researched the book in my own time and have finalized the original editing of the photographs, maps and manuscripts that will be included in the book.

This is a self publishing project in association with the Kairis Library

I have hired historian Sarantos Kargakos as editor and historical proof reader.

The artist Brigitte Polemis will design the original cover for the book inspired by her recent S/S Hellas Liberty exhibition.

Why your support is so important

We believe that this book is a legacy which is part of our cultural heritage. It needs to be published and made available to all of us and to future generations.

Without your support this fascinating, culturally valuable and touching story will remain untold.

Join me in my effort to fulfill the wish of my uncle the late Captain Nicholas H. Raissis to publish his memoirs.

Expenses and budget

We have already invested time and funds towards this project.

The new funds raised from this campaign will go towards:

  • Hiring a professional translator specializing in Maritime/Shipping

  • Design and lay out of the book

  • Printing expenses

Any funds raised over and above the amount of $ 10,500 will allow me to promote the book to libraries, museums and maritime colleges and institutions around the world.

It is my intention also to produce the book in electronic interactive format and thus make it more accessible to younger generations. It is also intented that 20% of the book revenues will be donated to Kairis Library.

The plan is for the book to be published and go on sale in December 2013.

Book specifications

Dimensions 24 Χ 14 cm

352 pages / 60 original photos / 5 illustrated maps

Great stories need to be told.

They make us wiser and more human.

story:
Do you want to fulfill a lifelong dream?

Do you want to let all the wishing go and just do it?

Do you want to take that leap?

It's time, and I can help you!

But first…I need your help! 

My new book, Confessions of a Shower Tapper: The Ultimate Guide to Living your Purpose using EFT, will teach you how to live your purpose in life using the Emotional Freedom Technique, also known as EFT, or tapping.

EFT is on the cutting edge of alternative healing and medical treatments. It is one of the few modalities that recognizes that beneath just about every physical problem lies an unresolved emotional issue. EFT works to remove these emotional issues and free us to move beyond these blockages.

EFT is a simple self healing acupressure technique that calms the amygdala of the brain, the fear center, and immediately lowers the cortisol hormone.. the stress hormones!  It brings you back to a state of peace and calm.  It has been proven to change your responses to issues.  

I am asking for your contribution to my campaign to get this book published so that I can help you “tap it all out.”

This book is aimed at reaching those who have a passion in life... coaches.. healers.. yogis.. artists.. therapist... chefs... authors...creative types...   but can’t get beyond the limiting beliefs that keep them stuck. It offers the skills to work through the overwhelm, the doubt, and the fear, providing you with the confidence to take that leap.

A self-help inspirational book that shares universal truths with all those who have a dream and who are daring enough to live those dreams.  It’s the biggest adventure you can take!  

Through hard work, perseverance, and faith, you can take that big leap.  But what happens when the going gets tough…’cause it will!  What happens when the phone isn’t ringing and the money isn’t coming in?  What then?  Do you give up?  Do you give in to the overwhelm?  To the limiting beliefs?  To the self doubt?  

Heck no!  

That’s when the tapping starts and the focus comes through. 

Be a part of supporting all those who have ever wanted to live their purpose.  

“Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.” LL Cool J

My Story

One day not so long ago I found myself in my shower confessing my fears.  I had just quit my day job and was working for myself.  The phone wasn’t ringing and my calendar was not filled in.  I heard a wee small voice saying … just tap.  

Thus began the flow of confessions, the biggest of which was admitting to using the Emotional Freedom Technique (tapping) in the shower.   The technique looks rather silly, which keeps many people (including myself at one time) from using this energy modality.  Yet, as I have come to find it, it is very powerful.

This book explores 21 confessions from my shower.  It offers insight not only into my thoughts and struggles on living my purpose, but also into universal themes for all of us as we step up to the edge of living a purpose-driven life. 

Confessions such as “I’m not good enough,” “Who wants to work with me,” “I’ll never make enough money,”  "I've got body issues," “They always book with her instead…”  Can you relate?

My vision in writing this book is for people everywhere to feel supported in removing the many limiting beliefs that hold them back from living the lives they want.  I want to offer an energetic way to work these issues out of the body and mind, and clean up the spirit so that your path can become clear and open.

No emotion is ever final.  This book will help you to free the emotions and remove the obstacles by tapping them out in order to face each day with a clean perspective.

At the end of each chapter are scripts you can use to tap with as you remove these universal issues out of the tissues and move forward toward living your purpose.

“Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.”   Napoleon Hill

My Goal of $4,444 is to cover expenses to self-publish and market this book to people worldwide.

I am almost there.  The book is written and through two rounds of edits. The cover is just about designed.  The funding will go toward: 

- completing the final round of editing

- illustrations of EFT

- book layout

- ISBN number

- first batch of printing

- marketing and distribution 

Here’s a quick peek at some of the perks that come with your support:

Your name on the “Thanks to our Supporters” page in the front of the book

First run book of Confessions of a Shower Tapper

Audio and video guides to the tapping points

EFT Skype sessions with me (Terri) to tap around your personal issues

EFT Skype coaching session for your business

Four weeks of Confessions – a weekly email to guide you through

Free admission to my upcoming webinar based on Confession # 10 - I Can't Charge that Much!

The Impact

We all know that unhappiness and depression can occur by not living our dreams.  We all know the downward spiral that happens when we refuse to look at the underlying cause of these issues.  Here is the help you seek!

I am asking for your support to help me help others learn the easiest way and best place to tap it all out by getting this book published.  I want to help more people.  

I've seen my students opening up to their true selves by removing the blocks that kept them stuck. 

I've seen weight loss occur from tapping on the issues of emotional eating. 

I've seen clients break through their fears of money by recognizing limiting beliefs, and then having the courage to move forward with their business.

I've helped people let go of old heartache and open up to find new love.  

And.. I 've seen my business grow.. the phones ringing again.. my calendar filling up!

I want to offer an energetic way to work these issues out of the body and mind to clean up the spirit so that your path can become clear and open.


“The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.”  Oprah Winfrey

Other Ways You Can Help

If funds pose a financial challenge for you but you still want to help, simply copy and paste our Indiegogo link in an email or use the Indiegogo share tool to tell your family and friends about a way to help them remove their limiting beliefs through this campaign. And please share us on your FaceBook, LinkedIn, Twitter, or Instagram.

I am incredibly grateful for your support.

To your Spirit,    


Terri

EFT is on the cutting edge of alternative healing and medical treatments. It is one of the few modalities that recognizes that beneath just about every physical problem lies an unresolved emotional issue. EFT works to remove these emotional issues and free us to move beyond these blockages.EFT is a simple self healing acupressure technique that calms the amygdala of the brain, the fear center, and immediately lowers the cortisol hormone.. the stress hormones!  It brings you back to a state of peace and calm.  It has been proven to change your responses to issues.  
I am asking for your contribution to my campaign to get this book published so that I can help you “tap it all out.”

This book is aimed at reaching those who have a passion in life... coaches.. healers.. yogis.. artists.. therapist... chefs... authors...creative types...   but can’t get beyond the limiting beliefs that keep them stuck. It offers the skills to work through the overwhelm, the doubt, and the fear, providing you with the confidence to take that leap.





A self-help inspirational book that shares universal truths with all those who have a dream and who are daring enough to live those dreams.  It’s the biggest adventure you can take!  
Through hard work, perseverance, and faith, you can take that big leap.  But what happens when the going gets tough…’cause it will!  What happens when the phone isn’t ringing and the money isn’t coming in?  What then?  Do you give up?  Do you give in to the overwhelm?  To the limiting beliefs?  To the self doubt?  
Heck no!  
That’s when the tapping starts and the focus comes through. 


Be a part of supporting all those who have ever wanted to live their purpose.  




“Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.” LL Cool J



My Story

One day not so long ago I found myself in my shower confessing my fears.  I had just quit my day job and was working for myself.  The phone wasn’t ringing and my calendar was not filled in.  I heard a wee small voice saying … just tap.  




Thus began the flow of confessions, the biggest of which was admitting to using the Emotional Freedom Technique (tapping) in the shower.   The technique looks rather silly, which keeps many people (including myself at one time) from using this energy modality.  Yet, as I have come to find it, it is very powerful.


This book explores 21 confessions from my shower.  It offers insight not only into my thoughts and struggles on living my purpose, but also into universal themes for all of us as we step up to the edge of living a purpose-driven life. 


Confessions such as “I’m not good enough,” “Who wants to work with me,” “I’ll never make enough money,”  "I've got body issues," “They always book with her instead…”  Can you relate?



My vision in writing this book is for people everywhere to feel supported in removing the many limiting beliefs that hold them back from living the lives they want.  I want to offer an energetic way to work these issues out of the body and mind, and clean up the spirit so that your path can become clear and open.


No emotion is ever final.  This book will help you to free the emotions and remove the obstacles by tapping them out in order to face each day with a clean perspective.

At the end of each chapter are scripts you can use to tap with as you remove these universal issues out of the tissues and move forward toward living your purpose.
“Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.”   Napoleon Hill

My Goal of $4,444 is to cover expenses to self-publish and market this book to people worldwide.


I am almost there.  The book is written and through two rounds of edits. The cover is just about designed.  The funding will go toward: 
- completing the final round of editing
- illustrations of EFT
- book layout
- ISBN number
- first batch of printing
- marketing and distribution 

Here’s a quick peek at some of the perks that come with your support:


Your name on the “Thanks to our Supporters” page in the front of the book
First run book of Confessions of a Shower Tapper
Audio and video guides to the tapping points
EFT Skype sessions with me (Terri) to tap around your personal issues
EFT Skype coaching session for your business
Four weeks of Confessions – a weekly email to guide you through
Free admission to my upcoming webinar based on Confession # 10 - I Can't Charge that Much!


The Impact
We all know that unhappiness and depression can occur by not living our dreams.  We all know the downward spiral that happens when we refuse to look at the underlying cause of these issues.  Here is the help you seek!
I am asking for your support to help me help others learn the easiest way and best place to tap it all out by getting this book published.  I want to help more people.  
I've seen my students opening up to their true selves by removing the blocks that kept them stuck. 
I've seen weight loss occur from tapping on the issues of emotional eating. 
I've seen clients break through their fears of money by recognizing limiting beliefs, and then having the courage to move forward with their business.
I've helped people let go of old heartache and open up to find new love.  
And.. I 've seen my business grow.. the phones ringing again.. my calendar filling up!








I want to offer an energetic way to work these issues out of the body and mind to clean up the spirit so that your path can become clear and open.



“The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.”  Oprah Winfrey


Other Ways You Can Help
If funds pose a financial challenge for you but you still want to help, simply copy and paste our Indiegogo link in an email or use the Indiegogo share tool to tell your family and friends about a way to help them remove their limiting beliefs through this campaign. And please share us on your FaceBook, LinkedIn, Twitter, or Instagram.


I am incredibly grateful for your support.
To your Spirit,    


Terri

story:
Welcome to our Indiegogo campaign to Pre-order The Essential Book of K9 and  become a huge part in making the book bigger than we could ever hope for.

I'm Paul Tams, who along with K9's original co-creator BOB BAKER created K9's own TV series which has and is still being broadcast on BBC KIDS, CHANNEL TEN, DISNEY XD, SY-FY, FIVE and THE CARTOON NETWORK, as well as on channels in many countries as diverse as TURKEY and RUSSIA.

The love for classic and new K9 is widespread across a vast age group across the world and we are passionate about celebrating this character in both further TV exploits and on the printed page.

K9 is an iconic character, having appeared firstly for several years in DOCTOR WHO; his own New Year BBC Special, THE SARAH JANE ADVENTURES and a return to DOCTOR WHO alongside 10th Doctor, David Tennant, then his own TV series featuring an upgraded design.  It's amazing there has never been a book dedicated to the full story of K9; his adventures in Time and Space and beyond and the making of the TV shows in which he appeared.  We aim to correct this oversight and present an amazing volume of Features, Photos and behind the scenes information. We also aim to have several new Stories and comic strips from Classic Writers including BOB BAKER himself.

This book will be unique and your funding will help us publish the definitive version that most publishers would see as too risky and costly to invest in.

We want to use the funding to also pay for classic comic strip artists  and expand the page count to well over 100 full colour pages. Writers and Artists and contributors will be announced as the campaign progresses.

We have set a goal of £5,000 UK pounds which will pay for print costs and some of our production costs involved. If we are lucky enough to exceed this amount we will approach other writers and illustrators to help expand the book and make it an invaluable must have for any fan's collection. All funds will go into making the book Bigger and even better!

The book will become a lasting tribute to the people who created, acted alongside, designed and built K9 throughout the years and an insight into the world of TV production. Plus a look behind the scenes at plans for K9's further adventures on screen!

Publishing this book ourselves gives us the artistic freedom to present an in depth look at K9 and his many lives and the shows in which he appeared.  Therefore we will not have a publishing house making demands on cuts and trying to aim the book at just one audience. We aim to  present the book we want to publish to  satisfy everyone. Publishers asked us to make it simple without the additional cost of using Artists for K9 CROSS-SECTION CUTAWAYS and Comic strips, but we see this as a creative and unique selling point.

The book will be available during this campaign at a SPECIAL price.

If we reach our initial goal we will unveil news and updates about the book  with new stretch goals being applied as we go along.

It's a big ask to get people to part with their hard earned cash and we can understand if some people just can't contribute, However, Please let your friends know about our campaign and the plans for this book.  Our pledges start at just £1 and we have lots of perks to choose from. You can share the links  to this page and let's hope we can publish the book K9 would be proud of.  We aim to have the book ready for late July 2015, deadlines and printers permitting.  Thank You

UPDATE!

THE BOOK WILL NOW HAVE A MINIMUM OF 120 PAGES! SPECIAL BONUS SPECIAL ADDITIONS!

For orders from £16 (UK) and £25 (INTERNATIONAL)  Funders will now receive an exclusive badge and a bonus Fridge magnet! The £50 Signed copies and the £100 funders will now receive a bonus of Two badges and the bonus fridge magnet!

story:
Hi! I'm Nicole Cipri. Welcome to my fundraising campaign.

I am a writer (and a barista, and a bike mechanic) living in Chicago. My writing has appeared in Daily Science Fiction, The Journal of Unlikely Entomology, Autostraddle, In the Fray, Gozamos, and The Eunoia Review. I also write plays, screenplays, and produce podcasts and radio features.

A few weeks ago, I was invited to attend the Clarion Writer's Workshop. For those of you who don't know, Clarion is a six-week-long workshop that focuses on writing short science fiction and fantasy stories. It's highly competitive, and only 18 students are accepted each year. It's a huge honor just to get in.

Now I have to pay for it.

Tuition for the workshop is about $5000, and my airfare to San Diego will be about $450. The lovely folks at Clarion have offered me a $1000 scholarship, and I've started working six days a week at my two jobs. I'm also applying for other grants, but won't hear back about them for a while. This leaves me about $4500 in the red, which is a lot for me--about three months' wages, in fact.

Clarion is a highly regarded workshop that's taught by an amazing lineup of writers and editors, and I've been dreaming of going since I learned of its existence. As a writer in the beginning of my career, attending Clarion is a huge opportunity. Anything you can offer in the way of support would be enormously appreciated. Also, I have some really fun perks for donating.

What you get for donating.

I'm offering print and digital copies of two creative works. The first is a short story that I wrote recently called "Liner Notes", which will have illustrations by Catie Dabney. The second is a comic that my sister and I collaborated on called "Two Boots In Love."

Speaking of my sister, she's also drawn up some amazing t-shirt designs.

This beauty is the Frida n' Me t-shirt. It features Frida Kahlo wearing a t-shirt with my face on it, which makes it at least 15% cooler than all the other Frida Kahlo shirts out there. You can see me wearing it in the video I made for this campaign.

The other shirt is the VERBAL TERRORIST shirt. Here's a rough version of the design. 

Last year, I managed to seriously anger the editor of an online political magazine. He had put out a call for articles about a proposed bill in California which would offer some protections for transgender students in schools. He called the bill absurd and said that it was allowing "boys in the girls locker rooms WTF?!?!" I offered to write him something about the bill, and then sent him the angriest, most excoriating rant I've ever committed to paper, naming him as a transphobic bigot as the big denouement. It didn't go over very well, and he called me a number of names, the most memorable of which was "verbal terrorist." You can read the whole story here on Autostraddle.

TL:DR version: a transphobic bigot was angry because I wrote something, and he called me a verbal terrorist. I put it on a t-shirt, which you can now own.

Anyway! The best perk of all: my mother is offering backers HOMEMADE BAKED GOODS.

My mom is the best mother, as this picture illustrates, and she's also a really fantastic baker. In exchange for supporting me in my journey to Clarion, she is willing to bake my backers cookies or pie. THAT'S RIGHT: PIE. She takes requests, and is able to work around gluten allergies and vegan preferences.

Thanks so much for donating! If you're still in a generous mood after reading this, my future classmate Haralambi Markov is also trying to raise funds to get to Clarion, and could definitely also use your help. You can donate to his campaign here!

San Diego or bust, friends! <3

story:
Tour of Hope

My name is Bronwyn Hope.  I am a writer based in Queensland, Australia, happily married, and the mother of two boys, aged 16 and 20.

In September 2011, I was diagnosed with breast cancer, which eventually resulted in chemotherapy, radiation and a double mastectomy.   I was encouraged to write about my experiences, choosing to use my situation to 'empower' women dealing with this common disease.

My memoir, 'The Breast is History' is the result.

MY DREAM NOW

My dream now is to empower women in remote and rural regions of Australian through my story.

I seek your support to help fund my book tour, my Tour of Hope in which I aim to visit 30 towns and cities around Australia, so that my memoir can benefit women living everywhere.

Many small towns around Australia do not benefit from the visits of authors emerging or otherwise as distance can make it prohibitive

I am determined to travel as far as I need to take my story to as many people as possible.

THE STORY OF HOPE

Mine is a story of NO FEAR and dealing with life's crises head on.  Mine is also a story about the importance of people in a life and how much love can be found in the darkest of tales.

I believe my story is a great story, told with wit and warmth, that has already made an impact.

By helping my Tour to become a reality, you will allow me to take my message of Hope to remote communities around Australia.

I have a positive, compelling and upbeat message that I have already shared with others through speaking engagements.

I know that I can make a difference.

GIVING BACK

Along the way, I hope to be able raise some funds for my favourite, service-based breast cancer charity, Chicks In Pink  which is operated by Australia's Mater Hospitals.

$3,500 is my initial goal.

100% of funds raised will be used to subsidise basic travel and accommodation.

By helping my Tour to become a reality, you will allow me to take my message of Hope to remote communities around Australia.

The Impact

By supporting my Tour of Hope, you will:

Help me to spread my positive message about beating cancer to rural communities around Australia;

Assist an emerging author seeking to make a difference in the world.

Help to raise funds for cancer research.

With my background in public relations and journalism, and my experience as a public speaker, I have the ability to ensure that the book is professionally published and packaged and that my Tour of Hope makes the impact it deserves.

I have had the book designed and typeset by Lucy Hargrave, an up and coming new designer based on the the Gold Coast.

I am also self-funding the creation of a website to help sell my books online.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to make a donation, please simply 'Like' my Facebook page, 'Bronwyn Hope' and help me share the links to my website and other promotional material.

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tool.

story:
Visit * www.mythmagazine.com * now!

New videos, writing and audio every week from Simon Wilson and Myth Magazine.

Hi. My name is Simon Wilson and I invite you to support Myth Magazine by making a contribution of $5 or more now. Myth Magazine is a virtual place where people interested in exploring meaningful and thoughtful work can read, watch and listen to become immersed in a variety of topics. Members can also make submissions.

Topics include the story of human life, humanity, community, relationships, scientific learning, futurism, mythology, myth forging in modernity, emergence, experience (the phenomenal world), thought, value, morality, emotion, happiness, synchronicity, dreams, how to live, how to come to terms with the world we live in, taking responsibility for ourselves and our species, governance, power and money, freedom and health, and everything related to such things.

What Myth can do for you, me, everyone

By supporting Myth, you are creating a space to:

  • explore synchronicity, philosophy, media, consciousness and creativity
  • explore life meaningfully, without clutter, without 'news' interference, without advertising, with sound principles
  • reach out to and help people to understand and enjoy the world and life
  • explore controversial ideas around topics such as privacy, responsibility, money, freedom and government
  • preserve explorative learning with a publication that offers completely transparent ownership and is unaffiliated with any mainstream media outlet

By contributing now to this crowdfunder you will be supporting Myth Magazine through paying the cost of internet production and materials.

Contributors are welcome to submit writing, audio, art and video from the get-go. Internet and office production costs include: software subsrciption, hosting, development and technology. If we exceed the goal, excess funds will go toward online marketing. If things progress well, I will make the MM budget structure publically available online by the end of August 2015.

The Perks

All the perks listed here include a personal (household) online subscription to Myth Magazine valued at CAN-$5. Myth Magazine is subscriber-only. 

Perk 1: A Membership ($5 - Limit of 55)

Membership of Myth Magazine lasting until the end of 2014, including everything published on Myth Magazine plus a LUCKY STAR on my 1000 Stars hero acknowledgment Wall of Flame (for the first 1000 members). 

Perk 2: Grinch ($25 - Limit of 20)

You get a membership for 2014 plus a uniquely designed and printed Christmas card with a random gift mailed to your door, postage included, or if you prefer some other holiday, no problem.

Perk 3: Publicity Hound ($44 - Limit of 5)

I could use a few things like an office phone, business cards, printer ink, paper and promotional materials. If you contribute, you get the 2014 membership, the card and gift at Christmas, plus a short, exclusive creative writing piece using key words of your choice.

Perk 4: Birds of a Feather ($100 - Limit of 3)

They say birds of a feather flock together. With this perk, you get an eternal membership plus the opportunity to collaborate with me on a creative project of your choosing or NOMINATE a topic for me to write and talk about in written, audio and video format to be published on Myth.

Perk 5: + Jedi Mind Kick ($150 - Limit of 5)

If you love the idea behind Myth and want to give more, choose this perk to get an eternal membership AND create 10 FREE annual Myth Magazine memberships for high school students, university students or friends of any age who show an interest in exploring the meaningful life. You don't have to do any work - I will hunt down and enlist the beneficiaries.


I'll Be Right Here

sw@mythmagazine.com


My Creds

I have a Philosophy degree and a Masters in International Security. I supplemented my knowledge base at Vancouver Island University where I studied digital media, creative writing, philosophy, theoretical psychology, First Nations studies, anthropology and history. 

I now host a radio show on CHLY 101.7FM - Myth Radio, live at 9pm on Saturdays and write and produce Myth Magazine. www.mythradio.com

I have worked professionally in various roles including college instruction, language instruction, youth and community services, magazine writing, internet production, design and promotions, and office management.


More about Myth

I hope Myth Magazine can develop into an intransient repository of explorative knowledge and wisdom. I would like to see many people of all levels of expertise from novice to prof submitting their work to be published on Myth Magazine. I would like to see people of all ages benefit from that sharing. I would like to see Myth Magazine becoming an ecosystem of ideas that contains wisdom in its deep genetic code renewed continuously with blossoming epiphanic flowers.

Challenges

I know which way the wind is blowing, and the answer is blowing in it. There is no use blowing against the wind. But if we all blow together in the same direction at the same time, we can strengthen the wind. And then, if a bunch of people run directly into that wind carrying Myth Magazine and release it at just the right moment... it will fly like a DeLorean.

reach out to and help people to understand and enjoy the world and life
explore controversial ideas around topics such as privacy, responsibility, money, freedom and government
preserve explorative learning with a publication that offers completely transparent ownership and is unaffiliated with any mainstream media outlet
By contributing now to this crowdfunder you will be supporting Myth Magazine through paying the cost of internet production and materials.Contributors are welcome to submit writing, audio, art and video from the get-go. Internet and office production costs include: software subsrciption, hosting, development and technology. If we exceed the goal, excess funds will go toward online marketing. If things progress well, I will make the MM budget structure publically available online by the end of August 2015.The PerksAll the perks listed here include a personal (household) online subscription to Myth Magazine valued at CAN-$5. Myth Magazine is subscriber-only. Perk 1: A Membership ($5 - Limit of 55)Membership of Myth Magazine lasting until the end of 2014, including everything published on Myth Magazine plus a LUCKY STAR on my 1000 Stars hero acknowledgment Wall of Flame (for the first 1000 members). Perk 2: Grinch ($25 - Limit of 20)You get a membership for 2014 plus a uniquely designed and printed Christmas card with a random gift mailed to your door, postage included, or if you prefer some other holiday, no problem.Perk 3: Publicity Hound ($44 - Limit of 5)I could use a few things like an office phone, business cards, printer ink, paper and promotional materials. If you contribute, you get the 2014 membership, the card and gift at Christmas, plus a short, exclusive creative writing piece using key words of your choice.Perk 4: Birds of a Feather ($100 - Limit of 3)They say birds of a feather flock together. With this perk, you get an eternal membership plus the opportunity to collaborate with me on a creative project of your choosing or NOMINATE a topic for me to write and talk about in written, audio and video format to be published on Myth.Perk 5: + Jedi Mind Kick ($150 - Limit of 5)If you love the idea behind Myth and want to give more, choose this perk to get an eternal membership AND create 10 FREE annual Myth Magazine memberships for high school students, university students or friends of any age who show an interest in exploring the meaningful life. You don't have to do any work - I will hunt down and enlist the beneficiaries.I'll Be Right Heresw@mythmagazine.comMy CredsI have a Philosophy degree and a Masters in International Security. I supplemented my knowledge base at Vancouver Island University where I studied digital media, creative writing, philosophy, theoretical psychology, First Nations studies, anthropology and history. I now host a radio show on CHLY 101.7FM - Myth Radio, live at 9pm on Saturdays and write and produce Myth Magazine. www.mythradio.comI have worked professionally in various roles including college instruction, language instruction, youth and community services, magazine writing, internet production, design and promotions, and office management.More about MythI hope Myth Magazine can develop into an intransient repository of explorative knowledge and wisdom. I would like to see many people of all levels of expertise from novice to prof submitting their work to be published on Myth Magazine. I would like to see people of all ages benefit from that sharing. I would like to see Myth Magazine becoming an ecosystem of ideas that contains wisdom in its deep genetic code renewed continuously with blossoming epiphanic flowers.ChallengesI know which way the wind is blowing, and the answer is blowing in it. There is no use blowing against the wind. But if we all blow together in the same direction at the same time, we can strengthen the wind. And then, if a bunch of people run directly into that wind carrying Myth Magazine and release it at just the right moment... it will fly like a DeLorean.

story:
~A Dream In Progress~

3 Years in the typing. 

My project Siel's Inferno: The Black Fire is a fantasy novel set in a medieval world. I have been working on this novel for the last three years--devising the plot, changing antagonists, adding new characters, creating monsters, envisioning gods, conveying fictional weapons, rhyming spell incantations, and charting several continents. 

Now, I will be honest with you. I have been unemployed for over 9 months since instead of looking for another job I decided to stay on benefits and work on my novel. I have edited this book two times now and would like to do a final edit before I feel it is complete and ready for a professional editor. I am currently looking for a full-time job, but with your help I will be able to continue my work unhindered of time constrains.

In the following link I have two chapters available for reading.

http://www.webook.com/submission.aspx?p=096129c09c984568bd98c57a2668672d&st=6267703fc30740e69f6826b60bf84adc

                                    The Money 

The truth is typing accrues no costs; the aid will go straight to the shelter and food and nothing more. In the event that this campaign fails to meet the goal, I will still work on my novel, unemployed, until the given funds run out. 

                            Thus Is Your Reward

  • Siel's Inferno: The WikiLore. This will comprise a separate book with detailed information of all the characters, weapons, races and artifacts, and a compendium of the world's history. Think of it as an encyclopedia. Overall, it will contain all the extensive information a fan would like to know about the world in which the novel takes place. This perk also comes with a copy of my novel.
  • A signed copy of Siel's Inferno: The Black Fire.
  • Special Edition. I will add several explicit chapters and/or chapters from the beginning of the second book that will not be included on the final, first book. 

There is a high possibility that this perks may be available sooner than the date shown.

                                    I Against Myself

    My project have no "Goliath" but it requires determination. As for challenges, through my experiences, I can say that writers' block is sure to come and go as it always does. I deal with it by taking my mind off from writing.

                      Your Opinion Is Music To My Ears

    Money is not the only contribution you can provide, there are many other ways in which you can offer aid; opinions, critiques, and feedback on my writing are three of many--an ones more valuable than any currency. If you feel compelled to speak your mind regarding my novel, whether negatively or positively, I will be very inclined to listen.

                                       ~Thank You~

    My deepest thanks for taking the time to scan through my project. In the event that you feel I am not legit please ask any questions or request more of my novel.

story:
Short Summary

  • Funding this project will allow me to participate in the Highlights Foundation Whole Novel Workshop for fantasy this May. They provide children's writers a supportive work environment through mentoring, lectures, and one-on-one critiques.

    My much-revised underwater adventure novel is for upper middle grade kids and mermaid fans of all ages. It's Andersen's Little Mermaid tossed on her head: Nerissa, a fisherman's daughter, unwillingly becomes a mermaid after she's been captured by a rogue merman. She's feistier than he imagined, and he's not as bad as she thinks. Nerissa's desperate to get back home, but first she has to deal with an evil mermaid, trained attack sharks, a bad case of sushi food poisoning, and a mythological creature of the deep. And if she survives, can she ever really go home?

    I'm excited to say that I've already been accepted for this workshop. Now, I just need to get there.

  • This project will not guarantee that my mermaid novel gets published, but attending the workshop will make it more publishable and deepen my skill as a children's fantasy writer, and the world can never have too many of those! Beloved author Lloyd Alexander said, “Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it."

    What better gift can we give to children?

     

My Background:

  • I've been writing almost as long as I've been reading, since the age of four. My love for cooking, baking, and feeding people came a bit later, but it's a delicious diversion when I'm a bit stuck in the writing department. I finished the University of Washington's Writing for Children certificate program in 2006, and since then I've been honing my writing skills through conferences, retreats, workshops, and professional critiques. Juggling that with volunteering for 826 Seattle and the Society of Children's Book Writers and Illustrators of Western Washington has been quite a challenge.

  • I've been enchanted by mermaids and all things pelagic ever since I first devoured Hans Christian Andersen's famous story. At nine, one of my first serious writing attempts was an undersea yarn heavily inspired by Jules Verne's 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea. Even through my teens, I read about doomed ships, pirates, and sirens. I'm hardly alone: humanity has been obsessed with mermaids since the first stories appeared in ancient Assyria around 1000BC. I want to give the world a great story with a few new twists on an old icon.

  • I co-captain an unruly but loving household of two kids, a dog, a cat, three chickens, five fish, and a snail named Barley. We all keep our eyes open for mermaids when we take the ferry across Puget Sound.

 

The perks I'm offering for your support:

  • Handwritten postcards with custom mermaid art by Kevin Cain
  • Fellow writers can receive my editorial feedback for your manuscripts or query letters
  • Foodies in the Seattle area can choose from invitations to a wood-fired oven pizza party in my own backyard or the chance of having me as your personal chef in your Seattle area home.
  • A summer writing workshop for kids
  • Every donor's name will be on a page of acknowledgments at my blog
  • Other rewards may present themselves along the way!

Whether I reach the goal or not, I'll be using the money to pay for the workshop and rewards!

 

The Impact

What excites me most about this Indiegogo campaign, is that it will bring together all sorts of people with varied interests. Mermaid fans, kid lit lovers, foodies, and friends. I'm a fan of crowdsourcing and crowdfunding because it shows us humanity's desire to connect and compassion in action.

I could have made this campaign a way to self-publish my book, but my goal is to find an agent who will help me find the right publishing house for this novel and the others that follow. The workshop is a big step in that direction and I hope you'll want to be a part getting me there.

  • Other Ways You Can Help

  • Many thanks to all of my supporters, whether you've spread the word about my project, or contributed directly to making it succeed. Don't forget to share this with friends using the Indigogo tools!

    Special thanks to artist Kevin Cain, Alison Weatherby, Victoria Farr Brown, Joni Sensel, Veronica Claire, Carissa Mellroth, Kevin McHugh, and John Hansen for the kind of generosity that makes a siren sing.

story:
Hello I’m Rolf Gunnar Hauge.  I’m 42 years old and have just finished writing a book about my life; the first half of my life leading up to a mid-life crisis which I currently dwell in.  I am a great person with high ambitions and a frenzied mindset.  I have survived through the most asinine circumstances and the stories that are shared are sometimes unfathomable.

With a writing span of over 13 years to complete the title of my book, Life in the Spin Cycle, is a metaphor relating to the phases of my life; phases of that compared to the cycles of a washing machine where I’ve made it through many obstacles and achieved but can’t complete the last cycle of the wash where the spinning ends and I have finally reached my goals and accomplished my life’s mission.

I’m now at the point where I’m ready to publish my book and use indiegogo to help me generate some funds which will allow me to obtain this objective.  The costs to self publish a book run high enough to where my lack of income will never get the job done alone.  (And you have to read the book in order to reveal how I’ve gotten myself in such predicaments.)  I believe in this book and just ask for any type of donation to help me reach my goal here on indiegogo.

I really hope this book can reach the masses who will not only be amused from reading through it’s entirety but can relate to some of the hardships I describe.  I wish this book to be the gateway to success and free me from the pointless monotony of the 8-5 job world.

If you're into music and want to check out my pirate radio show, tap into www.greenlightradio.com (I'm Cygnus and host the "eclectic mayhem" show)

story:
Nazareno tiene hoy 6 años, nació prematuro de 30 semanas de gestación, esto le provocó paralisis cerebral y no puede caminar ni sostenerse en pié por sus propios medios. Sus padres estamos constantemente investigando sobre nuevas tecnologías que puedan darle a nuestro hijo la posibilidad de movilizarse sin la necesidad de un andador o una silla de ruedas. Su parálisis le afecta mayormente la capacidad de controlar la intensidad del estímulo que el cerebro envía a los musculos del tronco y las piernas, provocándole un aumento del tono muscular permanente y por consiguiente la incapacidad de generar postura de equilibrio y un patrón de marcha normal. 

Las ortesis que actualmente hay disponibles para el tratamiento de Nazareno no le permiten movilizarse normalmente ni contribuyen a mejorar su calidad de vida.

Hemos ideado un sistema de control de estabilidad que combinando tecnologías ya existentes podría proveer a Naza de estabilidad asistida y de control de sus miembros, lo que permitiría que camine sin la ayuda de sus manos para sostenerse de un andador o depender de una silla de ruedas para traslados prolongados.

Este sistema combina las técnicas de captura de movimiento utilizadas en cine, los sistemas de control de estabilidad similares a los utilizados en la industria automotriz y la electroestimulación.

* Con la captura de movimiento se hará una captura de los patrones de Marcha de Nazareno y los patrones de marcha de un niño de la misma edad que no sufra parálisis, para poder armar un modelo digital de la marcha de Naza y compararlo en tiempo real con una base de datos existente.

* El procesador y el software de control de estabilidad deberia hacer la lectura en tiempo real y detectar los desvíos del patron de marcha ideal y enviar las señales necesarias para que los músculos complementarios compensen el patrón de marcha erróneo.

* La electro estimulación debería enviar pequeñas cargas eléctricas a los músculos determinados complementarios para compensar las cargas excesivas en los músculos internos de la pierna.

Debido a un concepto llamado plasticidad neuronal, el cerebro tiene la capacidad de reprogramarse mediante la repeticion de los patrones correctos de marcha pudiendo nuevas neuronas tomar el trabajo de las que fueron dañadas y generar la marcha correcta

De esta manera mientras él ejercita la marcha correcta iría re-programando su cerebro para que otras áreas adquieran el nuevo patrón de marcha y éste logre engramarse correctamente en su cerebro. así estaría rehabilitándose a la vez de poder hacer su vida con normalildad siendo asistido por un sistema que no lo imposibilita en otras partes de su cuerpo.

 

Necesitamos juntar la mayor cantidad de dinero posible para solventar la investigación de los técnicos y programadores que podrían desarrollar este dispositivo y ustedes nuestros colaboradores recibirían además de la gratificación de ayudar, un video de Naza agradeciendo en persona por vuestra ayuda ademas de recibir actualizaciones sobre los avances del proyecto.

Con la ayuda de ustedes no sólo benefician a Nazareno sino a toda aquella persona que pueda necesitar del desarrollo de este dispositivo ya que podría servir también a las personas que sufren un ACV por ejemplo.

Poder concretar este sueño no sólo ayudará a nuestro hijo a tener una vida lo mas normal posible, también sería un adelanto de la ciencia para todas las personas que lo necesiten, éste dispositivo sería fácil de usar y fácil de personalizar no importa si el paciente es niño o adulto, podría significar la diferencia entre caminar y estar en una silla de ruedas.

Si no puedes colaborar con nuestro proyecto, puedes darlo a conocer, es gratis y casi no lleva tiempoo hacerlo, cuanta mas gente se entere mas probable es que podamos llevarlo a cabo y por supuesto estaremos mas que agradecidos de tu ayuda.

Esta página expresa sus valores en Dólares Estadounidenses, si colaboras desde Argentina, ten en cuenta la diferencia de cambio.

Desde ya Gracias por tomarte el tiempo de leer estas líneas.

 

Lucas Y Egle Papas de Nazareno y Tiziano

story:
UPDATE:

With only 2 weeks left on the campaign, I am done with the first 5 chapters. Reaching $500 on this campaign will start my posting. Otherwise, the first chapter will drop on June 6.

With the finish line ahead of us, I want to reiterate what I said at the beginning--I'd love to give you 2-3 chapters per week, but I can't afford that without reaching the goal here. If we fall short, I will run the project at one chapter per week and I will honor all the perk levels, but the estimated delivery times will not be accurate because I will be working on this at night and on the weekends.

Please RT, reshare, and do anything else you can do to help if you want to keep that from happening. Thank you!

The Gist:

Last year, when I first started working on my web serial Defiant, I had no idea that doing a weekly piece of public writing could be so transformative and worthwhile. Not only did readers respond, they quickly made my weekly installments of Defiant into the most read and reshared feature of my blog. For the first time in my writing career, I had people emailing me and asking for more of my work, more quickly. This whole project had just started as a doodle--a side story to work on when I got frustrated with my ongoing novel project, and it was growing into my most appreciated work.

It didn't take long for me to double down on it. I started laying the groundwork for a more extensive personal story than the original outline called for, opening relationship and family questions that could sustain at least another thirty chapter series, if not a much longer run. By the time the story concluded, I felt like I had gotten there. Still, I wished that I had more material to draw from. I had a few questions planted in the plot that I needed to answer in the next season, but I didn't know what the answers were quite yet.

What was the thematic anchor? Who (other than his partner) would become pivotal in this new phase of his life? What had happened to his family? They had been a strong part of Nothing is Right, and yet, when I wrote Defiant, I found that Clay was estranged from the people who had shaped his formative years. That was when I realized what I'd been missing:

Before I could tell a story about where Clay Dillon is going, I needed to go back and tell more of the story of where he's been.

That's what Imaginary Friends is all about. It's a sequel to my first book, Nothing is Right, but it's also a sequel to the first part of Defiant, because it's going to be laying the groundwork for the major themes of familial pressure, bullying, and expectation that will be essential to the story I want to tell in the next season of that series.

If this all sounds exciting but you're a little wary of jumping into a series on the third installment, don't worry--I give a pretty solid overview below, and I'm offering plenty of perks that include copies of the other Clay Dillon books.

Our Tale So Far...

Nothing is Right: The first story about Clay was about growing up, learning to make friends, and becoming detached from your parents for the first time. In it, we followed Clay through his first grade year, seeing his challenges from his own point-of-view. I based much of Clay's perceptiveness on my own process of maturation growing up, including his vivid imagination and his tendency to shield himself with stories. In this book, we are also introduced to the public school system in Clay's small town, and we can see that the people there mean well but that they don't really understand Clay. We also find out, in various ways, that Clay's parents have some... questionable... methods when it comes to child-rearing, and that they value obedience and invisibility over inquisitiveness, discovery, and spectacle.

Much of the tension in Clay's life comes from the fact that he knows how to make overtures of hospitality, and he knows that they will make up for some of the things he doesn't understand, but his parents close their house and their lives to him, preferring their insular social circle to his attempts to reach out and make friends.

Defiant: Season One: In this story, we join a thirty year old Clay as he attempts, for the first time, to work for other people. The strain of attempting to work a "regular" job and the complex emotional baggage surrounding his spouse Noahleen's recent brain surgery have led him to try to seek psychiatric care, but because he does not have health insurance, his options are limited and he is forced to settle for a clinician whose methods don't work well with Clay's personality.

Still, he attempts to make do and to get along. The longer he sees Dr. Williams though, the more he finds himself wrestling with bouts of  anxiety and stress. He comes to understand these as suppressed feelings that have always asserted themselves during major changes in his life, and by the end of the story, he comes to terms with the fact that his personal transformation needs to reach well beyond accepting the truth about himself: that he is not just autistic, not just the one who has to work, not just inclined toward a certain sexual preference or gender presentation, but that all of these things are constantly interacting with each other and producing new challenges for him, and that they will continue to do so no matter how comfortable he thinks he's become within his own skin.

Imaginary Friends will extend both of these storylines by showing us Clay's second grade year and following him through catechism to his first Holy Communion. Along the way, it will also allow us to see how his personal relationships with his classmates are developing. It will also show us how his mother's Catholicism, her family background, and the circumstances of his birth work against his needs to put him into situations that he can not understand or navigate without help. Last of all, It will prepare us for Clay's reunion with his mother's family in Defiant: Season Two, providing us with the backstory that allows us to understand the dynamics in the family relationships that have formed during his absence.

That's all I'm saying for now. If you want to know how these things are going to play out, you'll need to wait until the story rolls out on my blog. If you can make a donation, then you can help that happen sooner rather than later.

Aims and Goals

When I ran Defiant last year, I only had the time to run a single chapter each week, and I wound up needing a little more than six months to run the complete book. This year, I want to run Imaginary Friends and to at least start Defiant's second season, but Imaginary Friends alone has almost fifty chapters. If I'm stuck running them at a rate of one per week, it will take until Summer 2015 to complete just that storyline.

That's where you come in. If this campaign is successful, I will basically be able to hire myself to write this serial for a month. That will be enough time for me to lay out rough versions of each chapter, to revise the first twenty into workable shape, and to proofread and queue up the first month of final, polished chapters. It'll give me a push that will allow the story to run at a pace of 2-3 chapters per week, which will shorten the release schedule from 54 weeks to about 20.

To do that, I need $3,200. That money will cover the basic costs for the book: my writing time, editing, proofreading, and formatting for the print and ebook editions. It will allow me to pay my cover designer and other freelancers who are working on this project, and it will keep me from having to extend the production schedule by doing all of these things myself.

If I hit my funding goal, the money will also will also cover the first two months of advertising after release, the ISBN registration, distribution, and other miscellaneous costs of publication. If I don't hit my goal, then I will be using whatever funds I do raise to pay for as much production help as I can afford, in order to decrease the production time by as much as I'm able.

If the stars align right and we raise an excess of funds, then I am also prepared to offer extra benefits, including a possible print edition of Defiant season one for contributors at the $30 perk. First things first, though: before I can give you Defiant in paperback, I've got to raise the money to put Imaginary Friends on my blog.

Spread the word

I'm grateful for anything you can do, from posting this to Facebook or Tumblr to blogging about it, reviewing my existing books, or driving new Twitter followers in my direction. And you'll still be able to enjoy the enhanced release schedule for Imaginary Friends as it unfolds on my blog.

I can really use the help, because there's no way for me to maintain a presence on every single social network that comes around these days, and it is undeniably a good thing to get my campaign posted to as many of them as possible. To do that, I need people who are active in those spaces to post this campaign for me or to link to the video pitch on Youtube.

After you donate, or if you want to help but you can't donate, please do me a favor by passing this campaign on through whatever social media you use most often. It will help me to reach my goal, and it will also let more people know about the project so that they will be reading when the first chapters start to roll out.

Closing

Thank you for your time and consideration. I really mean that. Even if you don't donate, by the time you get to these words you will have spent a lot of time and energy considering my project. I appreciate that you gave me that level of attention, even if you can't help me out this time.

- Michael Scott Monje, Jr.

story:
Hola somos Jot y Anna, editores de la Radio Al otro lado del espejo.

La radio nació en febrero de 2011, emitiendo ininterrumpidamente desde entonces a través de Internet.

Toda la familia de oyentes que nos escucháis y nos acompañáis día tras día, conocéis que nuestro proyecto de radio,  es un proyecto de crecimiento espiritual, de luz y de apoyo al despertar de una nueva consciencia planetaria.

Como ya sabéis nuestro trabajo es de pura entrega y sin ánimo de lucro, pero todo tiene un costo económico y cada vez nos resulta más difícil poder mantener todo el engranaje que supone la emisión  continuada de veinticuatro horas al día, todos los días.

El mantenimiento de los equipos, el pago del  hosting,  el streamig, las licencias, el recibo de la luz, la compra de  nuevos temas musicales, son gastos que no  podemos eludir  y cada vez resulta más costoso.

Por eso os  pedimos que junto a nosotros seáis  partícipes del proyecto Radio al otro lado del espejo,  a través de la microfinanciación que nos permite la Plataforma Indiegogo. Sed nuestros mecenas y co-creadores para que podamos seguir produciendo  programas y emitiendo la mejor música de alta vibración.

Si resonáis con nosotros y tenéis la posibilidad de ayudar en este proyecto, que es de todos, no lo penséis más, vuestro granito de arena  nos dará la posibilidad de seguir a delante, renovarnos y llegar a más y más personas.

Desde aquí un fuerte abrazo y miles de bendiciones y agradecimientos para todos y todas. Con todo nuestro amor. Namasté

Inversión anual

- Servicio de streaming anual:   242 euros

- Alojamiento hosting anual:      197 euros

- Licencias:

  (Chat Rumble Talk, Antivirus Comodo, Sam Broadcaster, etc.)  330 euros 

- Compra nuevos temas musicales para la radio:  200 euros

- Línea adsl anual:  565 euros

- Corriente eléctrica anual:  716 euros

- Gastos gestión financiación indiegogo: banco, paypal, indiegogo

y envio de cd's para los mecenas del grupo de 100 euros.    450 euros

En total asciende a 2.700 euros para gestionar los próximos 12 meses de emisión de la radio.

story:
Writer/Sailor/Writer

I write under the name H.E. Ross, short for Herman Eugene Ross. I am a writer who sails having once been a sailor who writes. I was born and raised in San Francisco and after four years in the Marines began my sailing on San Francisco Bay. I supported myself in the Caribbean Basin for over 30 years as a maritime journalist, periodical-photographer and publisher, as well as initiating three maritime cultural preservation organisations. I went to the Caribbean to do Project ISIS, Invisible Sailors Invisible Ships- documenting working sailing cultures. I have never stopped working on ISIS, having published one photo-essay on the Cayman Islands Catboat, and have two maritime heritage photo-essays awaiting editing. My blog is http://herossea.blogspot.co.uk and the series posted is Atlantic Creole: Black Folk Don't Sail.

My campaign focusses on using many of the stories and tales I have heard and experienced in a subscription-based website named for the first story in the series, Odyssey. The Odyssey website will be devoted to illustrated serialised adventures of the principle character, Rodrick Brown, a Black sailor-journalist. What Rod and I bring to the readership are in-depth and action accounts of Black maritime heritage, mysticism, romance, adventure with it all placed aboard sailing vessels along and within the Caribbean Basin and Mexico. The title, Odyssey, will use the Homeric adventure stories in contemporary renderings of actual tales.

The readership focus group ranges from teenager to the elderly, with an interested literacy and without a gender bearing.

Odyssey

The first tale - Odyssey - is about the return voyage of a turtle schooner from San Francisco to its home port in the San Sebastian Islands. There are problems from the outset because the crew is white and Rod is an Afro-American, resulting in a long stop-over in Mexico under the spell of a the spiritual cult of Madre Negra. Odyssey has 17 chapters and more than 97,000 words. I have three other novels for Odyssey Series and Rod will be getting involved with situations in San Francisco, Key West, Cayman Islands, Haiti, Cuba, Dominican Republic, Turks and Caicos Islands, Mexico, Columbia, Panama, Honduras, Guatemala and Nicaragua. 

Shipwreck     

The funding is to have the Odyssey website set up, maintained and illustrations created. 

A little more than 10 years ago I shipwrecked in the Tulum (Mexico) lagoon on my way back to the States after a nine-year research voyage focussing on the Caymanian Diaspora in the Northern and Western Caribbean. About one-third of my tapes and photography was lost. I plan to use modified photography to illustrate parts of the series and will use a percentage of the funding to replace some of the lost photography. There are 21 perfect reef protected tropical coves on Roatan Island in the Bay Islands of Honduras and Rio Dulce in Guatemala has jungle cliff faces and at their bases are small traditional  Mayan villages. 

Tales 

The stories will be posted every week with the old-time cliff hanger ending. I have created the character of Captain Rod Brown to tell his adventures that are really those I have heard or experienced. Most of what is written can generally be called tales but fiction is what I am sticking to and this gives me the range in writing to shape the readers' feelings. This is also my way of getting Black maritime heritage into a readership who are curious about our involvement with the sea.

Sailing The Tropics

Without getting too involved with my passion for this area of heritage and history I will say that the settings for the stories vary from cascading waterfalls to deep jungle, surging seas to translucent still waters. The characters are always individual and merges of many, many people who roam the waters of the world. There are prison torturers and innocent divas, prejudiced bullies and a university professor who is a gay shipwright. Rod is a city boy who becomes a part of the seafaring tropics without knowing it and that is what I want the readership to become a part of also.

Adventures Are On Course

As for my campaign, if the goal is not reached, I will attempt to have the website built without the high quality input it should have, use the stories I have at present without photographing the missing story locations, and the illustrations of those locations might have to be fewer. I hope that we will put Rod Brown on his website and colour it with the richness of his adventures. 

This is being written from aboard our 124-year old Dutch Sailing Barge, Aenna Te Gondern, where we live in the oldest shipyard in the maritime community of Woodbridge, Suffolk, England.

story:
Description générale du projet

Le projet Cartographie d'une fuite est fort simple : deux amies de longue date catapultées en Inde et au Sri Lanka qui désirent amasser des idées et du matériel (films, sons, images, photos) dans le but de créer un livre numérique original à leur retour à Montréal. Vous pouvez participer à la réalisation de ce projet en prenant part aux activités et en contribuant monétairement sur cette page.

 

Présentation des participantes 

Notre amitié remonte aux abords de la rivière des Prairies, dès l'automne de nos 12 ans. Depuis, bien de l'eau a coulé sous les ponts. Nous sommes devenues des maîtres à la dérive. De l'histoire à la muséologie en passant par la littérature, notre collaboration crée toujours des idées folles et riches de créativité. Cette fois-ci, nous souhaitons nous unir de nouveau pour assouvir nos besoins de nous exprimer, d'écrire, de découvrir et de voyager.  Des profondeurs de la Chine aux hauteurs du Népal, en passant par les citées reculées de Machu Picchu et de Paris (!), par les maisons troglodytes turques et les jungles touffues du Costa Rica, nous sommes devenues des passionnées de voyage et des backpakers émérites. Nous aimerions bien partager nos aventures avec vous.

 

Importance de votre participation

Nous venons toutes deux de terminer nos études universitaires de deuxième cycle. Nous sommes ainsi débordantes de créativité et avides d'une grande liberté, mais manquons quelque peu de moyens financiers. L'argent amassé servira essentiellement à couvrir les frais de subsistance et de déplacement pendant notre périple de trois mois dans le sous-continent indien. Avions, trains, bus, chameaux, … seront mobilisés pour vous offrir une expérience des plus authentiques et dépaysantes à travers notre récit. Notre bien-être gastro-intestinal sera proportionnel à votre générosité! Merci de nous encourager!


Anne Bernard et Myriam Côté, alias " 2 dindes en Inde "

Description
générale du projet

Le projet Cartographie d'une fuite est fort simple : deux amies de longue date catapultées en Inde et au Sri Lanka qui désirent amasser des idées et du matériel (films, sons, images, photos) dans le but de créer un livre numérique original à leur retour à Montréal. Vous pouvez participer à la réalisation de ce projet en prenant part aux activités et en contribuant monétairement sur cette page.

 

Présentation
des participantes 

Notre
amitié remonte aux abords de la rivière des Prairies, dès
l'automne de nos 12 ans. Depuis, bien de l'eau a coulé sous les
ponts. Nous sommes devenues des maîtres à la dérive. De l'histoire
à la muséologie en passant par la littérature, notre collaboration
crée toujours des idées folles et riches de créativité. Cette
fois-ci, nous souhaitons nous unir de nouveau pour assouvir nos
besoins de nous exprimer, d'écrire, de découvrir et de voyager.
 Des profondeurs de la Chine aux hauteurs du Népal, en passant
par les citées reculées de Machu Picchu et de Paris (!), par les
maisons troglodytes turques et les jungles touffues du Costa
Rica, nous sommes devenues des passionnées de voyage et des
backpakers émérites. Nous aimerions bien partager nos aventures
avec vous.

de votre participation
